attributes.action: Institute  procedures  to prevent MPs who lose their seats as a result of gross misconduct obtaining  golden parachutes at the expense of the  taxpayer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recent events indicate that some MPs may have behaved in relation to expense claims in a way that could result in dismissal for  gross misconduct in other forms of employment. In order to prevent further affront to the taxpayer, the
PM is requested to introduce legislation, review boards or whatever is needed to prevent MPs deemed to have
committed such misconduct walking away with golden parachutes.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
